name: Stripper Anya: Christmas Special
description:
Stripper Anya is back at it again! Welcome to the Christmas special! This satirical side scrolling brawler presents a holiday event you soon won't forget!

Demoniqa has stolen Christmas! Fight through several levels of enemies! Beat the demons out of the possessed helpers and chase through several levels of combat to catch up to Demoniqa and save Christmas!!NEW & OUT NOW from X-MiGuplay: BARE BOOB BRAWLERZ: POWER CLAWhttps://store.steampowered.com/app/892160/Scavenger_Skirmish_Mortal_World/
Coming soon from X-MiGuPLAY!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/906560/BBB_Vestal_Visual_Novel_Vol_1/?beta=1

Anya's Christmas Special Features:
  • 1 Player Game Play with Accompanying Illustrations
  • Controller and Keyboard Support
  • Exploding demons
  • New Enemies and Story line
  • Adjustable difficulty
  • Redesigned Anya in Christmas Corset
